delete.description: Begin deleting deployment.To determine whether the operation has finished processing the request, call GetLongRunningOperationStatus.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: deploymentName
parameters.description: The name of the deployment to be deleted.

put.description: Create a named template deployment using a template.

post.description: Cancel a currently running template deployment.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns all deployments.

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.

TemplateLink.description: Entity representing the reference to the template.

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.

ParametersLink.description: Entity representing the reference to the deployment paramaters.

template.description: Gets or sets the template content. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

templateLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the template. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

parameters.description: Deployment parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

parametersLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

mode.description: Gets or sets the deployment mode.

properties.description: Gets or sets the deployment properties.

dependencies.description: Gets the list of deployment dependencies.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
